structure.unit: ARTICLE V. WATER AND SANITARY SEWER CONNECTION

law.catch_line: Alternative water supply for developments of regional impact.

text.section:
Sec. 32-85. Alternative water supply for developments of regional impact.
Applications for new Developments of Regional Impact ("DRI") with a projected water demand of one million gallons per day or greater shall be evaluated by MDWASD to determine the feasibility of an alternative water supply project. Such projects may include the installation of a reverse osmosis plant, wastewater reclamation facility and reuse distribution system.
